item.title: Ruth add a quote by Dean Koontz
item.description: "Even in the darkest moments, light exists if you have faith to see it. " -- Dean Koontz

item.title: Ruth add a quote by Dean Koontz
item.description: "Where there is cake, there is hope. And there is always cake." -- Dean Koontz

item.title: Ruth add a quote by Dean Koontz
item.description: "Human beings can always be relied upon to exert, with vigor, their God-given right to be stupid. " -- Dean Koontz

item.title: Ruth add a quote by Dean Koontz
item.description: "On the Road that I have taken, one day walking I awaken, amazed to see where I've come, where I'm going, where I'm from." -- Dean Koontz

item.title: Ruth add a quote by Dean Koontz
item.description: "Books were this wonderful escape for me because I could open a book and disappear into it, and that was the only way out of that house when I was a kid. " -- Dean Koontz

item.title: Ruth add a quote by Dean Koontz
item.description: "Six billion of us walking the planet, six billion smaller worlds on the bigger one. Shoe salesmen and short-order cooks who look boring from the outside - some have weirder lives than you. Six billion stories, every one an epic, full of tragedy and triumph, good and evil, despair and hope. You and me - we aren't so special, bro." -- Dean Koontz

item.title: Ruth add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Get busy living or get busy dying." -- Stephen King

item.title: Ruth add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Books are the perfect entertainment: no commercials, no batteries, hours of enjoyment for each dollar spent. What I wonder is why everybody doesn't carry a book around for those inevitable dead spots in life." -- Stephen King

item.title: Ruth add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Monsters are real, and ghosts are real too. They live inside us, and sometimes, they win." -- Stephen King

item.title: Ruth add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "I think that we're all mentally ill. Those of us outside the asylums only hide it a little better - and maybe not all that much better after all." -- Stephen King

item.title: Ruth add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "The thing under my bed waiting to grab my ankle isn't real. I know that, and I also know that if I'm careful to keep my foot under the covers, it will never be able to grab my ankle." -- Stephen King

item.title: Ruth add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "There's no bitch on earth like a mother frightened for her kids." -- Stephen King

item.title: Ruth add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Schizoid behavior is a pretty common thing in children. It's accepted, because all we adults have this unspoken agreement that children are lunatics." -- Stephen King

item.title: Ruth add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Harry Potter is about confronting fears, finding inner strength and doing what is right in the face of adversity. Twilight is about how important it is to have a boyfriend." -- Stephen King

item.title: Ruth add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "there's no harm in hoping for the best as long as you're prepared for the worst." -- Stephen King

item.title: Ruth add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "If I have to spend time in purgatory before going to one place or the other, I guess I'll be all right as long as there's a lending library." -- Stephen King

item.title: Ruth add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "We all float down here!" -- Stephen King

item.title: Ruth add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "SSDD Same Shit Different Day" -- Stephen King

item.title: Ruth add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Wendy? Darling? Light, of my life. I'm not gonna hurt ya. I'm just going to bash your brains in." -- Stephen King
